H0.text: In what country is vodou religion commonly practiced. Dominican Republic

H1.text: In what country is vodou religion commonly practiced. Cuba

H2.text: In what country is vodou religion commonly practiced. Jamaica

H3.text: In what country is vodou religion commonly practiced. Ha√Øti

A4.text: Haitian Vodou, a syncretic religion practiced chiefly in Haiti

A5.text: Obeah, also known as Jamaican Voodoo

A6.text: Vodou is the majority religion of Haiti, for most Haitians practice both Vodou and Roman Catholicism.

A7.text: Vodou has spread to other Caribbean countries like the Dominican Republic, Cuba, and Puerto Rico.
